item.description: Some major categories of reinforcement learning: Off-policy Successor Representations TODO (Barreto, Borsa, et al. 2018) TODO (Barreto, Dabney, et al. 2018) TODO (Lehnert, Tellex, and Littman 2017) TODO (Borsa et al. 2018) TODO (Hansen et al. 2020) TODO (Sherstan, Machado, and Pilarski 2018) Reading Textbooks: Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction (Sutton and Barto 2018) (Sutton 2020) Barreto, Andre, Diana Borsa, John Quan, Tom Schaul, David Silver, Matteo Hessel, Daniel Mankowitz, Augustin Zidek, and Remi Munos.
